summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Silwer Lining Photography admin features. All admin pages functional - login, dashboard navigation, packages CRUD, booking settings, calendar sync, and bookings management all working correctly.

minor.issue: Some old test bookings missing package_price field (shows 'R' without value)
minor.impact: Display only - new bookings have correct price

passed_tests: Admin login with email: admin@silwerlining.com and password: Admin123!
Admin dashboard navigation - all 8 sidebar links work (Dashboard, Bookings, Packages, Booking Settings, Calendar Sync, Portfolio, Testimonials, Messages)
Packages Management - list packages, add package, edit package, delete package
Booking Settings - configure available days, time slots, booking rules, blocked dates
Calendar Sync - view and save calendar settings (MOCKED - actual CalDAV sync not implemented)
Bookings Management - view bookings, filter by status, edit booking details
All 20 pytest backend tests passed (100% success rate)
Package creation via UI with session type selection
Booking settings save with toast notification
Calendar settings save with toast notification
seed_data_creation: Test packages and bookings created during testing (prefixed with TEST_ for cleanup)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All admin features tested and working. Calendar sync is MOCKED (returns success but doesn't actually sync with Apple Calendar). Test data cleanup runs automatically after pytest tests.

mocked_apis_list: /api/admin/calendar/sync - Returns success but doesn't actually sync with Apple Calendar (CalDAV not implemented)
